name: toBase64
description:
Calculates the Base64 representation of a string or binary
 object. The Base64 format uses printable characters, allowing
 binary data to be sent in forms and e-mail, and stored in a
 database or file.

params.name: string_or_object
params.description: A string, the name of a string, or a binary object.

params.name: encoding
params.description:
For a string, defines how characters are represented in a
 byte array.

examples.title: String Example
examples.description: Converts a String to a Base64-String.

examples.title: Binary Object Example
examples.description: Converts an Image Binary to a Base64-String.

links.title: URL Safe Base64 UDF
links.description: A UDF to encode / decode using URL Safe Base64. Uses native Java API (requires Java 8+)
